Package aoc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Generator
    Play the role of subject in Observer Pattern Play the role of client in Active Object pattern in update call Play the role of Servant in Active Object pattern in getValue call Interface to handle all necessary method for all these patterns
    GeneratorAsync
    Play the role of service in Active Object pattern for the getValue call
    ObserverGenerator
    the observer that would display the generator value Play the role of observer in Observer Pattern
    ObserverGeneratorAsync
    Play the role of service in Active Object pattern for the update call
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    Main class to run the service Generator, display and channel instanciation attach display to channel attach channel to generator Play with corePoolSize in Executors.newScheduledThreadPool Run the generator to start the service
    Channel
    Implementation of ObserverGeneratorAsync and GeneratorAsync interface Play the role of Proxy in Active Object Pattern Play the role of Observer in Observer pattern with the generator as Subject Play the role of Subject in Observer pattern with the displays as Observers It the mediator between generator and Display, here is the instanciation of Methode Invocation GetValue and Update and the scheduling with random delay value
    Display
    Concrete implementation of Observer in Observer pattern with channel as subject Will display the generator value
    GeneratorImpl
    Implementation of Generator interface play the role of Concrete subject in Observer pattern Also implement Runnable in order to offer a Run method
    GetValue
    Methode invocation GetValue in Active Object pattern
    Update
    Methode invocation Update in ActiveObject Pattern
